name: zeng-color-picker
description:
A Zeng-style color picker, which supports (a)rgb and grayscale.
You can custom the color format easily.
You can also specify a file filter by language or path.

zeng-color-picker.Filter.ApplyInTheseFil.markdownDescription: A [glob pattern](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#GlobPattern) that is matched on the absolute path of the document, separated by space.

zeng-color-picker.Preview.MatchPatterns.markdownDescription:
Use `UPPER` letters(R,G,B,A,W) to indicate hex color components(red, green, blue, alpha, grayscale). 

- Similiar items, such as *RGBA* and *ARGB*, will confuse the detector, hence should be avoided. 

- The **order** in the list matters.

zeng-color-picker.Picker.InsertAfterPick.markdownDescription:
Same rule as `#zeng-color-picker.Preview.MatchPatterns#`. 

Leave blank to let it guess, which is `recommended`.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
